Red Accent

The Red Accent project... It started with a future plan between two friends. Now it's a collaboration between the Belgian wingsuiter, Sven Ugau, and me.

Sven Ugau is a famous name in the world of wingsuit BASE jumping. From the moment he did his first skydive jump, his goal was to be an wingsuit BASE jumper. With his passion and perseverance, he became the world's most famous name in wingsuit target flying.
